DefaultEvent.Description: She can't, or won't, speak, but it's clear she knows the zee. She'll do well, this one.
DefaultEvent.Name: Welcome her aboard

ChildBranches.Name: Permit it
ChildBranches.Description: ...though other zailors clutch their zee-talismans and make signs against evil. The folk of Whither are uncanny: those who are exiled to Codex must be more so.

DefaultEvent.Description: You can't see her face. Does she even care? You're a long way from everywhere that matters.
DefaultEvent.Name: She shrugs and turns away

RareDefaultEvent.Description: ...shakes her head, slowly: and makes a complex sign with her hand. The sea crashes on the shore. Someone is watching.
RareDefaultEvent.Name: She spits on the ground

ChildBranches.Name: Refuse it
ChildBranches.Description: You'll pick your crew more carefully.

Description: A Mute Exile wants to join your crew. Will you permit it?
Name: An Exile Aboard?
